metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to crawl spaces whose exterior walls have less than 25% of their total area above exterior ground level open to the outdoors
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to crawl spaces whose exterior walls have less than 25% of their total area above exterior ground level open to the outdoors

requirements.description: Maximum percentage of exterior wall area above ground level open to outdoors for crawl space classification
requirements.exact_quote: crawl spaces whose exterior walls have less than 25% of their total area above exterior ground level open to the outdoors

requirements.description: Foundations enclosing crawl spaces shall conform to Section 9.15
requirements.exact_quote: Foundations enclosing crawl spaces shall conform to Section 9.15

requirements.description: Crawl space is considered heated if used as hot air plenum, contains unsealed/uninsulated heating ducts, or is not separated from heated space per Section 9.25
requirements.exact_quote: Crawl spaces shall be considered to be heated where the space a) is used as a hot air plenum, b) contains heating ducts that are not sealed and insulated to minimize heat loss to the space, or c) is not separated from heated space in accordance with Section 9.25

requirements.description: Heating of heated crawl spaces shall conform to Section 9.33
requirements.exact_quote: Heating of heated crawl spaces shall conform to Section 9.33

requirements.description: Insulation, air barrier system and vapour barrier shall be installed in walls of heated crawl spaces per Section 9.25
requirements.exact_quote: Insulation, an air barrier system and a vapour barrier shall be installed in the walls of heated crawl spaces in accordance with Section 9.25

requirements.description: Minimum access opening size for crawl space serving single dwelling unit (500 mm by 700 mm)
requirements.exact_quote: An access opening of not less than 500 mm by 700 mm shall be provided to each crawl space where the crawl space serves a single dwelling unit

requirements.description: Minimum access opening size for other crawl spaces (550 mm by 900 mm)
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 550 mm by 900 mm for other crawl spaces

requirements.description: Access openings shall be fitted with door or hatch, except when crawl space is heated and access is from adjacent heated space
requirements.exact_quote: Access openings shall be fitted with a door or hatch, except when the crawl space is heated and the access opening into the crawl space is from an adjacent heated space

requirements.description: Unheated crawl spaces shall be ventilated by natural or mechanical means
requirements.exact_quote: Unheated crawl spaces shall be ventilated by natural or mechanical means

requirements.description: Minimum unobstructed vent area for natural ventilation: 0.1 m2 per 50 m2 of floor area (1/500 ratio)
requirements.exact_quote: ventilation shall be provided to the outside air by not less than 0.1 m2 of unobstructed vent area for every 50 m2 of floor area

requirements.description: Vents shall be uniformly distributed on opposite sides of building and designed to prevent entry of snow, rain and insects
requirements.exact_quote: Vents shall be a) uniformly distributed on opposite sides of the building, and b) designed to prevent the entry of snow, rain and insects

requirements.description: Heated crawl spaces shall be ventilated in accordance with Section 9.32
requirements.exact_quote: Heated crawl spaces shall be ventilated in accordance with Section 9.32

requirements.description: Minimum height of access way to equipment requiring service in crawl space
requirements.exact_quote: an access way with a height and width of not less than 600 mm shall be provided from the access door to the equipment

requirements.description: Minimum width of access way to equipment requiring service in crawl space
requirements.exact_quote: an access way with a height and width of not less than 600 mm

requirements.description: Minimum clearance on service side(s) of equipment in crawl space
requirements.exact_quote: for a distance of 900 mm on the side or sides of the equipment to be serviced

requirements.description: Water ingress into crawl space shall be controlled by grading or drainage except where shown unnecessary
requirements.exact_quote: Except where it can be shown to be unnecessary, the ingress of water into a crawl space shall be controlled by grading or drainage

requirements.description: Drainage of foundation walls shall conform to Article 9.14.2.1
requirements.exact_quote: Drainage of foundation walls shall conform to Article 9.14.2.1

requirements.description: Drainage of ground cover or floor-on-ground in crawl space shall conform to Subsection 9.16.3
requirements.exact_quote: Drainage of the ground cover or floor-on-ground in the crawl space shall conform to Subsection 9.16.3

requirements.description: Drains shall conform to Section 9.14
requirements.exact_quote: Drains shall conform to Section 9.14

articles.title: Ground Cover in Unheated Crawl Spaces

requirements.description: Minimum asphalt thickness for unheated crawl space ground cover
requirements.exact_quote: a ground cover shall be provided consisting of not less than a) 50 mm of asphalt

requirements.description: Minimum 15 MPa Portland cement concrete thickness for unheated crawl space ground cover
requirements.exact_quote: 100 mm of 15 MPa Portland cement concrete

requirements.description: Type S roll roofing is acceptable for unheated crawl space ground cover
requirements.exact_quote: Type S roll roofing

requirements.description: Minimum polyethylene thickness for unheated crawl space ground cover
requirements.exact_quote: 0.10 mm polyethylene

requirements.description: Minimum lap for sheet-type ground cover joints in unheated crawl spaces
requirements.exact_quote: Joints in sheet-type ground cover required in Sentence (1) shall be lapped not less than 100 mm and weighted down

articles.title: Ground Cover in Heated Crawl Spaces

requirements.description: Minimum polyethylene sheet thickness for heated crawl space ground cover
requirements.exact_quote: a ground cover consisting of not less than 0.15 mm polyethylene sheet conforming to CAN/CGSB-51.34-M

requirements.description: Minimum lap for ground cover joints in heated crawl spaces
requirements.exact_quote: The ground cover required in Sentence (1) shall have its joints lapped not less than 300 mm

requirements.description: Heated crawl space ground cover joints shall be sealed and weighted down or covered with min 50 mm concrete
requirements.exact_quote: a) be sealed and evenly weighted down, or b) be covered with concrete not less than 50 mm thick

requirements.description: Minimum concrete thickness over heated crawl space ground cover
requirements.exact_quote: be covered with concrete not less than 50 mm thick

requirements.description: Perimeter of heated crawl space ground cover shall be sealed to foundation wall
requirements.exact_quote: The perimeter of the ground cover required in Sentence (1) shall be sealed to the foundation wall

requirements.description: All penetrations of heated crawl space ground cover shall be sealed against air leakage
requirements.exact_quote: All penetrations of the ground cover required in Sentence (1) shall be sealed against air leakage

articles.title: Crawl Spaces as Warm Air Plenums

requirements.description: Only crawl spaces under 1-storey portions of dwelling units shall be used as warm-air plenums
requirements.exact_quote: Only crawl spaces under 1-storey portions of dwelling units shall be used as warm-air plenums

requirements.description: Enclosing material in crawl spaces used as plenums shall be noncombustible
requirements.exact_quote: Enclosing material in crawl spaces described in Sentence (1) shall be noncombustible

requirements.description: Combustible ground cover in plenum crawl spaces shall be protected beneath register openings with noncombustible material
requirements.exact_quote: Combustible ground cover in crawl spaces described in Sentence (1) shall be protected beneath each register opening with noncombustible material

requirements.description: Noncombustible register protection shall extend not less than 300 mm beyond register opening projection
requirements.exact_quote: The noncombustible register protection described in Sentence (3) shall a) extend not less than 300 mm beyond the projection of the register opening

requirements.description: Noncombustible register protection shall have up-turned edges
requirements.exact_quote: have up-turned edges
